attributes.additional_details:
either remove it all together or reduce it to £10. 
also provide receipts as to where the money is going to.
attributes.background: remove congestion charge, its too expensive. at a time where people are struggling to live day to day. there is no evidence that congestion charge has made any difference to london. travelling around london is already too expensive but to increase congestion and parking tickets is outrageous

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and Transport for London (TfL).

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
